trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGYOK6EARTHENSHIRE_00875_TARNOTIK_000_000<tab>Pfff... Pfffkohhh... Happywelcome to Earthenshire! How can Tarnotik handhelp?

TEXT_REGYOK6EARTHENSHIRE_00875_TARNOTIK_000_001<tab>Tarnotik earcatches that lowlander's friend was twinklycrowned as the new Dawnservant. Will lowlander say goodwords to crownyfriend about Earthenshire? If so, Tarnotik will tell <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> everything about it!
TEXT_REGYOK6EARTHENSHIRE_00875_TARNOTIK_000_002<tab>The helphands and the crafthands work hand in hand! The potpact lives on! It is another puffpanty day in Earthenshire!

TEXT_REGYOK6EARTHENSHIRE_00875_TARNOTIK_000_010<tab>Tarnotik is a helphand. Helphands' job is to handhelp crafthands with whatever they need to complete their asktasks to the best of their tricksyskill.

TEXT_REGYOK6EARTHENSHIRE_00875_TARNOTIK_000_011<tab>Must provide the perfect, comfyfeeling workspace for crafthands...but not too comfyfeeling, or crafthands will not handcraft! Need to find the right balance between stresssoothing and pokeyprodding!

TEXT_REGYOK6EARTHENSHIRE_00875_TARNOTIK_000_020<tab>Earthenshire is a Moblin thinkything, built with Moblin claycraft. Now it is home to both we Moblins and the potsworn to whom we offer our home, and our handhelp.
TEXT_REGYOK6EARTHENSHIRE_00875_TARNOTIK_000_021<tab>Potsworn are mastercrafters all, and with our handhelp, they make many, many masterpieces. For our playpart, we make much, much jinglyshine!
